readme:
# ion-select-option

SelectOption is a component that is a child element of Select. For more information, see the [Select docs](../select).
docs: SelectOption is a component that is a child element of Select. For more information, see the [Select docs](../select).

props.name: disabled
props.docs: If `true`, the user cannot interact with the select option.

props.name: value
props.docs: The text value of the option.
